entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
